attributes.action: Label all Halal Meat in Supermarkets in all Supermarkets in Britian
attributes.additional_details:
People should Know how the Meat they are Eating has been Slaughtered.
But many of us are now regularly eating meat that has been blessed and slaughtered by a religious Muslim. This type meat is called halal and it forms an increasingly large part of the UK meat industry.
Tesco, M&S, Waitrose, Somerfield, Co-Operative and Sainsburys are Just some Food Companies that have Been found Guilty of not Informing Customers they have been Selling Halal Meat in their Supermarkets and on Cases, to Non Muslims.
This Petiton is to get Meat Labelled if it is Halal Meat in every Single Supermarket in Britian.
